Reviews
Write a Review on Bill's News&Confectionery Ltd in the city Dawson Creek:
Your name:
Your review:
Spam-Protection: Sum of 3 plus 9
Shawna posted on 11/12/2008: Bill's News is awesome. The second or third (I forget) largest magazine seller in B.C., they also have lots of candy, chocolate, pop, microwavable sandwiches (and a microwave in the store) also a large assortment of Novels and comic books. Friendly staff and owners, and a great place to work XD
